DOC.brief_title: EUROpE-RSI ( EURopean Online Evaluation RSI Study )
DOC.detailed_description: The study design web-based online survey anaesthetist Europe . They invite via mail , member European Society Anaesthesiology ( ESA ) , participation voluntary . The survey contain 30 item standard procedure in-hospital rapid sequence induction ( RSI ) . There selection possible answer , item contain free-text answer . The study collect personal data age , country , gender level training . The collected data identify difference procedures RSI .
